did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Correspondence and subject files of the Virginia Auditor of Public Accounts,

odd.p: These records are part of the Virginia Auditor of Public Accounts record group (RG# 81)

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Correspondence and subject files of the Virginia Auditor of Public Accounts, 2006-2009. Accession 51237, State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 51237 was transferred by Auditor of Public Accounts, 03/14/2014

scopecontent.p: Correspondence and subject files, 2006-2009, of the Virginia Auditor of Public Accounts. Contains electronic copies of official correspondence that was either addressed to or signed by the Auditor of Public Accounts, and includes Microsoft Word documents, Microsoft Excel spreadsheets, Microsoft PowerPoint presentations, email messages, PDF files, and HTML files, among others. Topics include correspondence with members of the General Assembly and the general public, revenue analysis for state agencies, the opinion of the Auditor of Public Accounts on various bills in the General Assembly, capital expenditures, higher education restructuring, and other related topics.
